5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Maimunah, the wife of the Prophet (ﷺ), said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) used to perform prayer when I was opposite to him, and his garment would sometimes touch me when he prostrated.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ صَلَّى وَبَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْقِبْلَةِ شَىْءٌ
chapter.eng-name: One who performs Prayer with something between himself and the Prayer direction
